25744142.review:
I've previously played the DOS version of this game and liked it a lot. This version has non-pixelated art which, although not as charming as the original's, is pretty nice. The game also gives you a choice to use the original MIDI or WAV, and there's Japanese voice acting as well.

For people who've never played this before, it's basically a scheduling game. You select what your daughter does from month to month: Certain activities build up certain stats, which make certain endings possible, and the fun lies in finding out how your actions play out. There are also brief interludes with simple JRPG-style combat and exploration.

While I'm happy that the game is on Steam, the English translation is painfully sloppy. The introductory movie is full of substandard English, and the game itself is full of typos: Amourer instead of armourer, for example.

Typos don't prevent people from playing the game, but because Princess Maker 2 relies on the quality and charm of its writing, I urge CFK to do the right thing and improve the translation in a patch. As it stands, the typos make the game look like a quick and dirty port, which does CFK's reputation no favors.

Edit: Now that I've played a game through, I can see that there's another serious fault. In the DOS version, your daughter would write you a letter when she became an adult, either thanking you or criticizing you for your parenting. In the Steam version, she reads that letter aloud in Japanese, but there's no English text. If you don't speak Japanese, then, you're out of luck as far as understanding what she's saying. This means that what was a touching moment in the DOS version is now just going to leave a lot of English-speaking players confused. This absolutely needs to be fixed in a patch.

25744078.review:
So the return of nostalgia. This is a cult favorite child raising simulator. 

You are a sword man who defeated the demon leading an army to destroy the kingdom. Soon after that you encounter a goddess who tell you to raise the girl as your own daughter. From there you will choose how she dress, whats her diet, what she study, and what she do as a job. The game have a lot of little detail that are nice to see, such as if her diet is poor then she will have harder time work jobs that take more stamina. Or if she go to the beach for vacation, then she'll come back with a tan. You have 8 years to raise the girl (she's 10 when the game start) into a young lady. Really there a lot to do in this game and it will require many playthroughs to see many of the different endings and events of the game. 

My one con to this game is that it doesn't really give you a tutorial or hints to let you know which jobs raise/lower what stats before you do it. So your first couple playthroughs will most likely be fumbling around to see what cause what effect, or what the best way to handle a problem (such as the daughter getting sick or becoming a delinquent). Heck it took me a while to figure out why everyone kept dodging my daughter attacks while she was in combat (yea you can send your daughter adventuring out and fighting monsters).

All in all, this is a child raising sim with an addictive play style to it. Be prepared to lose hours trying to raise your daughter into becoming something great like a princess or queen.

☆　日本語のレビューは下に書きました。

Nostalgia returns! I have played all PM1, PM2, PM3 (Faery Tales Come True) PM4, PM5 and the cell phone verion PM. PM2 was originally relased as PC-9801 and was then released to support windows 95. "Refine" version was then released to support Win XP. Now it's redefined to support more recent OS via Steam.
I am glad to see the game brought back to life again!

In this game, you become a father of a girl given to you from the skies. You will be taking care of her for eight years. During those years, you will have her earn her moneys from working, and let her attend classes to boost her skills. To turn her into a Princess is all in your hands!

Game features:
Adventure mode - Gear up your daughter! Attend classes to boost combat skills.
Once a year events - Choose from Cooking / Art / Dance / Combat. Demonstrate your skills to your competitors!
Vacations - Boost those skills. Cute illustrations to make some memories.
Meet the NPCs in the castle - Let them know who you are. Be the lady they're looking for.
Many endings - Her future depends all on you. Did her dream come true?

Pros: Great game to play repeatedly as there's many different endings. It also has great portraits at the end of the game / Fun adventure mode. Visit all four areas! / Challenging once a year event. Show off your talents! / Full voiced in Japanese (voices weren't available until Refine version) / That nostalgic MIDI sounds and musics / Supports Win 10 - 64 bit / All ending achivements are added (Patch 02/18/17)

Cons: Eight years will pass by FAST/ Screen size is 800x600. High resolution even on full creen mode / Some bugs are game braker (Fixed on 02/18/17 patch) Some game bug has been reported + I have experienced myself as well:When you click an item in the 2nd page of your inventory, your daughter's Faith goes down to 0. There's so far no way to raise the faith back above 0. It negatively affects your daughter's daily routine and her ending.

25741588.review:
10月3日
第一次通关，新锐画家结局，最终传世之作，嫁给了骑士。感性总是弄到一半就刹不住车了。太可怕。不过这次结局是全养成，没有进行武者探索，下次再开个新游戏继续来。

10月2日
更新了徽章，让我们来凑满吧。
10月1日
祝节日快乐。通过这几天玩了一下，发现度假时表示季节的语句消失了（各个季节）简体繁体均是。而且无法使用F12截图，想要分享截图到steam的玩家可以沉寂了。官方现在已经发帖承诺修正，目前还没看到修正内容，希望能够快速修补完成。
PS：很久不玩印象都偏差不少，以前记得刚开始凑合一下就能收支平衡去上课了，现在发现完全赚不够上课的钱，只能靠打工锻炼自己了。
初期就如同托儿所阿姨说的那样：其他不雅管了，第一是体力，第二也还是体力。没有好的体力，以后干什么都不行的。让我们一起来耕田吧。

9月29日
昨天在群里发了图之后，竟然有不少人问这个是什么游戏。我发现电玩代沟其实已经出现了。所以在此给没有玩过系列作品的朋友们做一个简介。
美少女梦工厂（美少女梦工坊）是赤井孝美先生创立的一个系列作品，游戏的主旨是将一个非亲生女孩从8岁抚养至18岁，通过教育、打工、体能管控等手段，使其渐渐成长起来，玩点是自由的培养模式和多结局，当然除5代之外每代角色会每年改变一次长相，白富美旅游会有很漂亮的CG都是玩家喜欢的内容。
本次推出的2代绮丽版是在原作（dos、win黄金版）的基础上，经过重绘和重新配音制作出来的。删去了原作中某些不适合未成年人的部分。
可以说除了pm1之外，2，3，5每代作品各有特色，2代凸显的是冒险，3代是优化的日程列表，5代则注重长期的培养过程。2代作为系列作品中对冒险着笔最重的一作，在4张探索地图中存在各种各样的地点，并根据玩家的角色情况达到不同的结果，而这种冒险的魅力，使取消野外探索的3代在很长时间不被老玩家接受。
一句话推荐：如果你是老玩家，不需要多说自然会自己选择；玩过这个系列的其他作品，而没有玩过2代，这是一个品味的好机会；如果你没有玩过系列作品，而且对养成有爱，pm2一丁会为你带来快乐。

9月28日
作为刚接触电脑玩的游戏之一，pm系列伴随了我很长的时间，除了4代以外，赤井孝美先生给我们带来了一个梦幻而又甜蜜（色色）的奇幻世界。现在版权已经卖给CFK，赤井先生的pm也只能到5代结束了，怀念没有出来的梦幻版4，也希望版权方能把1、3、5搬上steam.PS：如果能有原版一并搬上来就更好了。

25741220.review:
기존의 윈도우버전으로 출시한 리파인버전과 다른 점을 초반부로서는 확인할 수가 없었습니다.
정말 이 게임 시리즈에 애정을 가지신 분들은 구입하셔도 괜찮을 듯 싶지만, 이 게임에 특별한 애정이 없는 제가 보기에는 '새롭게 조금이라도 추가된 점이 없는 그냥 이식한 게임, 스팀 에디션'인 것 같네요. 
게임을 켜자마자 가장 먼저 눈에 보이던 문제점들. 
탭 키를 누르면 창이 최소화됩니다. 그 때문인지는 몰라도 제 컴퓨터에서는 스팀 오버레이가 안 열리더군요. F12를 눌러도 스크린샷이 촬영되지 않습니다. 어쩌면 스팀 오버레이를 아예 지원하지 않는 것일수도 있겠네요. 화면마저 기존의 4:3 비율이니, 게임 창을 전체화면 하니까 당연하게도 제 모니터에서는 화면 비율이 달라 죽 늘어나 보입니다.
개인적으로 이 장르를 그렇게 좋아하진 않았습니다만 그래도 스팀으로까지 나오면서 뭔가 있을까 기대했었는데, 실망했습니다. 
추억을 라이브러리에 담는 가격 치고는 개인적으론 비싸다 생각해서 일단 비추천 드리겠습니다.
그래도 공식 한글화된 게임은 귀중하니, 언젠간 다시 이 게임을 구입할 때가 있겠죠.
